title.en: Midnight Sanctuary of the Digital Rain

description.ko: 차가운 금속과 디지털 시대의 활기찬 네온 광채가 만나는 미래 대도시의 낭만적인 영혼을 담았습니다.
description.en: The romantic soul of a futuristic metropolis, where cold metal meets the vibrant, neon glow of a digital era.

prompt: A low-angle cinematic view of a rain-drenched #1A0033 cyberpunk alleyway, featuring a massive #FF00FF neon shrine reflected in hyper-realistic asphalt puddles. The scene is saturated with #00FFFF light trails and futuristic urban textures of rusted #FF6B35 metal and wet carbon fiber. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytracing. Deep volumetric fog and realistic light spill from high-density urban structures capture the digital romance of a futuristic city, with a sharp focus on individual rain droplets hitting metallic surfaces.
